item.title: Github action to publish Hugo site from a private repo to a public repo
item.description: I wanted to setup a GitHub page for this blog but not a big fan of exposing everything in the repo. So thanks to this post, I setup a github action to publish the hugo site from a private repo to a public repo that’s setup for GitHub Pages. Here’s the workflow: # This is a basic workflow to help you get started with Actions name: Hugo Build & Deploy - Private to Public # Controls when the action will run.
